sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const CheckoutForm: React.FC = () => { const [selectedPaymentMethod, setSelectedPaymentMethod] = useState("creditCard"); const orderItems = [ { id: 1, name: "Basic Tee", color: "Black", size: "Large", price: 32.0, imageUrl: "https://via.placeholder.com/50", quantity: 1, }, { id: 2, name: "Basic Tee", color: "Sienna", size: "Large", price: 32.0, imageUrl: "https://via.placeholder.com/50", quantity: 1, }, ]; const subtotal = orderItems.reduce( (total, item) => total + item.price * item.quantity, 0 ); const shipping = orderItems.length > 0 ? 5.0 : 0; const taxes = orderItems.length > 0 ? 5.52 : 0; const total = subtotal + shipping + taxes; useEffect(() => { // Load the PayPal SDK script dynamically const loadPayPalScript = () => { const existingScript = document.getElementById("paypal-sdk"); if (!existingScript) { const script = document.createElement("script"); script.src = `https://www.paypal.com/sdk/js?client-id=YOUR_CLIENT_ID`; script.id = "paypal-sdk"; script.onload = () => { initializePayPalButton(); }; document.body.appendChild(script); } else { initializePayPalButton(); } }; loadPayPalScript(); }, []); const initializePayPalButton = () => { window.paypal .Buttons({ createOrder: (data: any, actions: any) => { return fetch("/create-paypal-order", { method: "POST", }) .then((response) => { return response.json(); }) .then((data) => { return data.orderID; }) .catch((error) => { console.error("Error creating PayPal order:", error); throw error; }); }, onApprove: (data: any, actions: any) => { return actions.order.capture().then((details: any) => { alert("Transaction completed by " + details.payer.name.given_name); // Handle successful transaction here }); }, onError: (err: any) => { console.error("PayPal error:", err); alert("An error occurred during the transaction."); }, }) .render("#paypal-button-container"); }; const handleConfirmOrder = () => { if (selectedPaymentMethod === "paypal") { // Ensure PayPal SDK is loaded before attempting to render the button if (!window.paypal) { console.error("PayPal SDK not loaded."); return; } // Render PayPal button initializePayPalButton(); } else { // Handle other payment methods here } }; return (

EARLYBIRD
{/* Contact Information and Shipping Information */}

CONTACT

SHIPPING INFORMATION

PAYMENT METHOD

setSelectedPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} className="mr-2" />
{selectedPaymentMethod === "creditCard" && (
)}
setSelectedPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} className="mr-2" />
setSelectedPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} className="mr-2" />
{/* Order Summary */}

Order summary

{orderItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

) : (
{orderItems.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.color} - {item.size}

${item.price.toFixed(2)}

{item.quantity}
))}
Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping ${shipping.toFixed(2)}
Taxes ${taxes.toFixed(2)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}
)} {/* PayPal button container */}
); }; export default CheckoutForm; function useEffect(arg0: () => void, arg1: never[]) { throw new Error("Function not implemented."); }
